resources.string:
"Hi there.. My name is VIVA and I'm your personal digital assistant application.\n"
"I am capable of handling voice calls and can act as a voice recorder. I can read and write messages and emails.\n"
"I can also setup alarms, take voice notes, remind you of certain things. I can monitor your health and can suggest improvements based on your choices.\n"
"I am your friend and will be available for you both offline and online."
